list_translation_mean.translate_mean: bàn sơ qua một vấn đề

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: score or mark the surface of (something) with a sharp or pointed object.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the car's paintwork was battered and scratched
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vùng sơn của chiếc xe đã bị đánh đập và bị trầy xước

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cancel or strike out (writing) with a pen or pencil.
play a record using the scratch technique.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he raps and scratches simultaneously to dazzling effect
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta rap và trầy xước đồng thời đến hiệu ứng rực rỡ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mark or wound made by scratching.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the scratches on her arm were throbbing
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: những vết trầy xước trên cánh tay của cô ấy đang nhói

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a technique, used especially in rap music, of stopping a record by hand and moving it back and forth to give a rhythmic scratching effect.
the starting point in a handicap for a competitor receiving no odds.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was working to get some scratch together
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã làm việc để có được một số vết xước với nhau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: assembled or made from whatever is available, and so unlikely to be of the highest quality.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: at least two vessels set sail with scratch crews
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ít nhất hai tàu đặt buồm với phi hành đoàn đầu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a sports competitor or event) with no handicap given.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was a scratch player at many courses
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông là một cầu thủ đầu tại nhiều khóa học
